dalserver

Class DbColumns

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.DbColumns
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable

    public class DbColumns
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable
    The DbColumns class implements a parameter set mechanism oriented toward service request parameters. A parameter set is an ordered set of parameters; a parameter has a name, type, value, and other metadata.

    • Method Detail

      • addParam

        public void addParam(Param param)
        Add a parameter to a DbColumns. The parameter set is ordered, with newly added parameters added at the end of the list.
        Parameters:
        param - An object of type Param.

      • addParam

        public void addParam(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String value)
              throws DalServerException,
                     InvalidDateException
        Add a parameter to a DbColumns. The parameter set is ordered, with newly added parameters added at the end of the list.
        Parameters:
        name - The string name of a parameter.
        value - The string value of the parameter.
        Throws:
        DalServerException
        InvalidDateException

      • getParam

        public Param getParam(java.lang.String name)
        Lookup a parameter by name.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String newValue)
              throws DalServerException,
                     InvalidDateException
        Set or update the value of a parameter (convenience method). Causes the value of the isSet attribute to be set to true if the new value is non-null, false otherwise. For finer control the methods of the Param class should be called directly.
        Parameters:
        newValue - The new parameter value, as a String.
        Throws:
        DalServerException
        InvalidDateException

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String name)
                          throws DalServerException
        Get the value of a parameter as a String (convenience method).
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name.
        Returns:
        Returns the parameter value as a String, or null if no parameter value is set.
        Throws:
        DALServerException - If parameter is not found.
        DalServerException

        public java.util.Iterator iterator()
        Get an iterator to access a DbColumns as a list.
